task.name: g.gui.tplot
task.description: Plots the values of temporal datasets.

parameter.name: stvds
parameter.description: Name of the input space time vector datasets

parameter.name: strds
parameter.description: Name of the input space time raster datasets

parameter.name: coordinates
parameter.description: Coordinates

parameter.name: cats
parameter.label: Categories of vectores features
parameter.description: To use only with stvds

parameter.name: attr
parameter.label: Name of attribute
parameter.description: Name of attribute which represent data for plotting

parameter.name: output
parameter.label: Name for output file
parameter.description: Add extension to specify format (.png, .pdf, .svg)

parameter.name: size
parameter.label: The size for output image
parameter.description: It works only with output parameter

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
